name: rainbow granny square sweater
notes:
create a retro crochet granny square sweater with our stunning pattern, available in sizes xs to 5xl. this easy design combines the traditional granny square with endless colour options to make it truly yours. make just 4 granny squares then add as much ribbing or length after seaming to suit you!

this pattern is suitable for beginners as it includes step-by-step instructions to guide you through the process. the pattern includes sizes ranging from xs-5x to create the perfect fit for yourself or a loved one. you’ll also get access to a step-by-step video on youtube showing you exactly how to create the sweater from start to finish.

*please note*-- this listing is for a pdf pattern written in english, not a finished product.

pattern features:
adult sizes xs to 5xl (30-62" chest): ensure the perfect fit for every body type.
skill level: easy
stitch: granny square and stitch
instant pdf download
with and without ribbing options
adjustable length and styling options 
full video tutorial (to support written pattern if you are a visual learner)
us crochet terms
uk stitch conversion chart

why you'll love this pattern:
versatile design: customize the length and sleeves to be perfect for your style.
customize the styling: with options for a traditional rib edging or a lighter option for summer
detailed instructions: 13-page pdf in us crochet terms for clear, easy-to-follow guidance.

materials needed:
category 3 (dk) yarn (i used prism dk, 100% acrylic, 265m/290yds/100g) 
approx 5 (5, 5, 6, 6) (6, 7, 7, 7) balls of yarn for the sweater with sleeves. approx 1200 (1350, 1450, 1560, 1630) (1700, 1810, 1930, 2035)yds.
crochet hook 4.5mm (g+) or the size that meets the gauge for the pattern.
yarn needle
scissors
stitch markers

pattern includes:
detailed instructions over 13 page ebook
stitch guide
sizing chart/schematic
step by step stitch tutorial
colour inspiration page
full video tutorial
customisation guide

ideal for:
dress up or down for the office or home
a beach or holiday top for daytime or evenings
a fun summer top that taps into the current granny crochet square trend

instant download: start crocheting your own granny stitch top today! purchase includes immediate access to the 13-page pdf pattern in us crochet terms.

gauge: 
4 rounds of granny square = 4" by 4"

discover a modern crochet sweater pattern that you'll love to create, featuring fun details and a flattering design perfect for everyone.
